埩字的基本解释

埩
zhēng
耕治。

埩
chéng
中国古代鲁城北门池。

埩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēng］
［《廣韻》側莖切，平耕，莊。］
耕地整田。
[②]［chéng］
［《廣韻》士耕切，平耕，崇。］
古代鲁城北门池。

埩字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埩； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页230第34
【廣韻】側莖切【集韻】甾莖切，?音爭。理也，治也。　又【廣韻】士耕切【集韻】鉏耕切，?音崢。魯城北門池。

埩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
埩字的起名意思

指耕治，也指中国古代鲁城北门池。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
zhēng
Farming.
Xi
chéng
The north gate pond of Lucheng in ancient China.
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhēng］
["Guangyun" side stems are cut, flat plowing, Zhuang. ]
Farmland preparation.
[②]［chéng］
["Guangyun" Shi farming and cutting, flat farming, Chong. ]
The ancient north gate pond of Lucheng.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　埩; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 230 34
[Guang Yun] Cut the side stem [Ji Yun] Cut the steroid stem, sound contention. Reasoning is also governing.　[Guangyun] Shi Gengqie [Jiyun] Gengqie,? Yinzheng. Lucheng North Gate Pool.

Name meaning
Refers to farming and governance, and also refers to the north gate pond of Lucheng in ancient China.
